title: SenservaPro
descriptionMarkdown: The SenservaPro data connector provides a viewing experience for your SenservaPro scanning logs. View dashboards of your data, use queries to hunt & explore, and create custom alerts for your needs. Start your security journey today

sampleQueries.description: All SenservaPro data in the last 24 hours
All SenservaPro data with 'High' Severity, ordered by the most recent received
sampleQueries.query:
SenservaPro_CL
            | where Severity == 3
            | order by TimeGenerated desc

dataTypes.name: SenservaPro
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
SenservaPro_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
SenservaPro_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

instructionSteps.description:
>Get more done, faster with SenservaPro's user and application security reviews.

>Are you a Microsoft 365 and Azure Administrator or Security Auditor concerned about small misconfiguration causing a massive problem for your organization and your customers? Do you worry about a security breach due to misconfigured accounts? Designed with ease-of-use and low management in mind, Senserva delivers a high value solution to help fix undetected problems surrounding identity and access.

>Our mission is to provide visibility into the security posture, configuration, and overall risk assessment of users and applications registered to your Azure Active Directory tenant. We help you understand how you can leverage Microsoft security features with Senserva to reduce your attack surface.

instructionSteps.title: 1. Set up the data flow for the connector as part of your SenservaPro installation
